title.romaji: Dragon Ball Z: Ora no Gohan wo Kaese!!
title.native: ドラゴンボールZ オラの悟飯をかえせッ!!

synonyms: Dragon Ball Z: Return my Gohan!!
Dragon Ball Z - La vendetta divina
Dragon Ball Z: Garlick Junior Inmortal

Dragon Ball Z: Movie 1 - Dead Zone
description:
Kami-sama's old nemesis's son has come to exact revenge on Kami-sama for winning the title of Earth's Guardian. After kidnapping Son Gohan and using the dragon balls to gain immortality, he has a final showdown with Goku.

(Source: Anime News Network)
